content:
I have finished up my work with fractional iteration, including Mathematica code which is now in the Wolfram Function Repository. Most of what I have discovered in my research can be unpacked from the following identity for HHH. My work has been influenced by From Finite Sets to Feynman Diagrams and an understanding of structure types.

My focus now is learning category theory and writing proofs. I have written a proof for
P[n]≅dndxnf(g(x))\mathcal{P}[n] \cong \frac{d^n}{dx^n}f(g(x))P[n]≅dxndn​f(g(x)) and I now need to prove K[n]≅dndxnft(x)\mathcal{K}[n] \cong \frac{d^n}{dx^n}f^t(x)K[n]≅dxndn​ft(x).

A family of structure types

I=(1,2,3,⋯ )\mathcal{I}=(1,2,3,\cdots)I=(1,2,3,⋯)

P=MSET(I)\mathcal{P}=MSET(\mathcal{I})P=MSET(I) A000041

S=SET(SET≥2(Z))\mathcal{S}=SET(SET_{\ge 2}(\mathcal{Z}))S=SET(SET≥2​(Z)) A000110

K=Z+MSET≥2(K)\mathcal{K}=\mathcal{Z} +MSET_{\ge 2}(\mathcal{K})K=Z+MSET≥2​(K) A000669

L=Z+SET≥2(L)\mathcal{L}=\mathcal{Z}+SET_{\ge 2}(\mathcal{L})L=Z+SET≥2​(L) A000311

Bn,kB_{n,k}Bn,k​ is a partial Bell polynomial.

dndxnf(g(x))=∑k=1nf(k)(g(x))⋅Bn,k(g′(x),g′′(x),…,g(n−k+1)(x)).{d^n \over dx^n} f(g(x)) = \sum_{k=1}^n f^{(k)}(g(x))\cdot B_{n,k}\left(g'(x),g''(x),\dots,g^{(n-k+1)}(x)\right).dxndn​f(g(x))=∑k=1n​f(k)(g(x))⋅Bn,k​(g′(x),g′′(x),…,g(n−k+1)(x)).

Set g(x)=ft−1(x)g(x)=f^{t-1}(x)g(x)=ft−1(x)

H(0,t)=LH(0,t)=LH(0,t)=L, where LLL is a fixed point

H(1,t)=f′(L)tH(1,t)=f'(L)^tH(1,t)=f′(L)t the Lyapunov multiplier, denoted λ\lambdaλ, with λ≠0\lambda \ne 0λ=0.

H(n,t)=∑r=0∞(∑k=1nf(k)(L)k!Bn,k(H(1,t−1),…,H(n−k+1,t−1)))rH(n,t)=\sum_{r=0}^\infty(\sum_{k=1}^n \frac{f^{(k)}(L)}{k!} B_{n,k}(H(1,t-1),\ldots, H(n-k+1,t-1)))^rH(n,t)=∑r=0∞​(∑k=1n​k!f(k)(L)​Bn,k​(H(1,t−1),…,H(n−k+1,t−1)))r

ft(x)=∑k=0∞1k!H(k,t)(x−L)kf^t(x)=\sum_{k=0}^\infty\frac{1}{k!} H(k,t) (x - L)^kft(x)=∑k=0∞​k!1​H(k,t)(x−L)k

Mathematica code

FractionalIteration function

FractionalIteration[fiFunction_, fiTime_, fiTerms_Integer : 4,
    OptionsPattern[]][fiPosition_] := Module[{f, t, x, fp, r, h},
   fp = OptionValue["FixedPoint"];
   h[0] = fp;
   h[1] = f'[fp]^t;
   If[OptionValue["ForceParabolic"],
    f'[fp] = 1;
    ];
   Do[
    h[max] = First[r[t] /. RSolve[{r[0] == 0, r[t] == Sum[
            Derivative[k][f][fp] BellY[max, k,
              Table[h[j] /. t -> t - 1, {j, max}]], {k, 2, max}]
           + f'[fp]*r[t - 1]}, r[t], t]],
    {max, 2, fiTerms}];
   Sum[1/k! h[k] (x - fp)^k, {k, 0, fiTerms}] /. f -> fiFunction /.
     t -> fiTime /. x -> fiPosition
   ];
